content: And when we talk about record pipeline generation, that's something that we want to ensure that we're not only getting to levels, but we're doing it with the appropriate and healthy mix across geographies, across customer segments, across use cases, and most importantly, right now, as it pertains to the mix of Capella. Yes, look, we -- again, as I said, we're trying to be mindful of everything that's going on around the world today, even beyond just the macroeconomic and try to best assess that and how we think it could impact Couchbase in the second half of the year. But I think one of the things that we're very mindful of, as we believe we're a battle-tested team and being part about -- understanding deal cycle dynamics or the fact that there may be additional inspection on economic value in TCO and making sure we're planning for that in our sales cycles, balancing our demand generation across customer segments.
